A brief discourse concerning the three chief principles of magnificent building viz., solidity, conveniency, and ornament / by Sr. Balthazar Gerbier D'ouvilly, Knight. Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
[13], 44 p. : port.
[s.n.], London : 1662.
"Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Richard Lowns ... Thomas Heath ... and Matthew Collins ..., 1662"--P. 44. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
